statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET age = 30, country = 'USA' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith', email = 'alice.smith@example.com' WHERE user_id = 102;
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Smith', age=30 WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='bob@example.com', country='USA', preferences='{"theme": "dark", "notifications": true}' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value = 'blue' WHERE user_id = 1 AND preference_name = 'favorite_color';
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value = 'true' WHERE user_id = 456 AND preference_name = 'dark_mode';
UPDATE UserProfiles SET full_name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE CustomerSupport SET status='Resolved', issue_description='Issue resolved successfully' WHERE ticket_id=456;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET full_name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE CustomerSupport SET status = 'Resolved', issue_description = 'Issue fixed, closing ticket' WHERE ticket_id = 201;
UPDATE Users SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890', first_name='John' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE Preferences SET language='Spanish', theme='Dark' WHERE user_id=3;
UPDATE Users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE SupportTickets SET description = 'New description', status = 'Closed' WHERE ticket_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET city='New York' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE preferences SET timezone='GMT+2' WHERE pref_id=3;
UPDATE users SET city='New York', country='USA' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE preferences SET theme='Dark', timezone='UTC+2' WHERE user_id=3;
